newsitem.title: TUNISIA: UBCI BANK TAKES TUNIS BOURSE UP.
newsitem.headline: UBCI BANK TAKES TUNIS BOURSE UP.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Tuesday closed up by 0.33 percent driven mainly by UBCI bank which rose by 12.5 percent, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 525.42 points from 523.69 on Monday.
Total volume was 1.02 million dinars against 911,190 dinars over the previous session.
UBCI was up six dinars to 54.02 dinars with 3,343 shares changing hands. Banque Nationale agricole won 1.82 dinars to 31.79.
Chemical firm SPCD gained 1.08 dinars to 37.68 dinars. Household firm Ateliers Mecaniques du Sahel rose 0.42 dinar to 14.52. Retail stores MONOPRIX advanced 0.2 dinar to 38.5 dinars.

Banque de Tunisie fell 1.4 dinars to 82.6 dinars. Placement de Tunisie edged lower 0.88 dinar to 14.12 dinars. STB bank was down 0.59 dinar to 19.2. BTEI bank slid 0.54 dinar to 23.42. Airliner Tunis Air declined 0.22 dinar to 23.68 dinars with the exchange of 6,914 shares. ($1= 1.06 dinar)
